description.narrative: National systems are generating and analysing equity-focused and gender-sensitive data on children affected by armed conflict, Birth Registration, children in conflict with the law and child victims of trafficking and SGBV., which contributes to Access To Justice, Child Protection â€“ General. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Improved and equitable preventive and responsive services addressing violence, abuse and exploitation of children
